A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While not being the best Star Wars movie\, it's pretty far from being the worst. Grouchy Luke was fun\, Kylo's rise to power was clever\, & Leia was awesome. New character Rose was brilliant\, need more of her. I was a little disappointed with Poe's arc\, his plan was a wild goose chase. Overall\, I was very happy with it.
